ValidationRule.description: Only a System Administrator can uncheck a Do Not Call
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED( Do_Not_Call__c ), Do_Not_Call__c = False, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator API",
$Profile.Name <> "Sales Data Steward" ,
$Profile.Name <> "Salesforce Support" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** Only a System Administrator can uncheck a Do Not Call ***
